title: Thai Vegetables with Coconut and Cashew Nuts
ingredients: ['75g cashew nuts', '2 tbsp sunflower oil', '1 onion, finely chopped', '100g button mushrooms, sliced', '125g mange-touts', '125g baby corn, halved lengthways', '1 green pepper, halved and sliced', '3 tsp Thai green curry paste', '400ml half-fat coconut milk', '100g bean sprouts']
